AndiCar is a free and open source car management software for Android powered devices.

 See the About page for more details.
 Thank you for using AndiCar!

Below are some general usability rules for AndiCar:
 * press your device Menu key to see the options applicable to a specific screen
 * in the lists tap a record to edit it. Long press it for more options

 ** visit www.andicar.org -> "How To" to learn about how to use AndiCar **

 Thank you.

 Refresh the page in your browser if you get a "Web page not available" message.
 * For questions you are welcome to the AndiCar discussion list at http://groups.google.com/group/andicar.
 * For bug reports or enhancement requests do not hesitate to use the AndiCar issue system at https://code.google.com/p/andicar/issues/list.
 * You can subscribe for the project news at www.andicar.org/News/.
 * For other things you can send an email to andicar.support@gmail.com.

Thank you for using AndiCar.
